commit.message:
Merge pull request #33 from breerly/fix-no-exc-info

Fix concurrent.future errors not being propagated
fix concurrent.future errors not being propagated

Merge pull request #32 from eklitzke/master

fix spurious assertions that were always true

fix spurious assertions that were always true

The syntax:

    assert foo, "message"

Checks `foo` and then prints "message" if `foo` is false.

The syntax:

    assert (foo, "message")

Checks that the tuple `(foo, "message")` is True, which it always is,
and therefore doesn't actually test anything.

Make tests work with Python 3.5
